data.message:
Help!!  I created a group, and then later added two people as admins to help me. Well they just removed me as an admin. How can they do that? How can I get my group back?
Why is there no customer service?!

replies.message: Hi Veronica. If you lose access to a group you admin, it's most likely because one of the other group admins removed you as an admin. Try reaching out to the other admins and asking them to add you back. If you think you lost access because of an error, learn how to report the problem to Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/help/186570224871049 -Hailey
Facebook how come i can't see who's following me? :)
Page creator must be superior to page administrator. Will make life easier for most of us.
